body_html: So I think this is some interaction between pypi's numpy and Ubuntu 14.04. Either upgrading to Ubuntu 16.04 or building numpy from source (pip install --no-binary) fixes it in every case I've tried (GPU/no GPU, jemalloc disabled/enabled, Python 2.7/3.4/3.5)
body_text: So I think this is some interaction between pypi's numpy and Ubuntu 14.04. Either upgrading to Ubuntu 16.04 or building numpy from source (pip install --no-binary) fixes it in every case I've tried (GPU/no GPU, jemalloc disabled/enabled, Python 2.7/3.4/3.5)
body: So I think this is some interaction between pypi's numpy and Ubuntu 14.04. Either upgrading to Ubuntu 16.04 or building numpy from source (pip install --no-binary) fixes it in every case I've tried (GPU/no GPU, jemalloc disabled/enabled, Python 2.7/3.4/3.5)
